page.title: 01THE AREA- WEST CHESTERFIELD
page.content:
Block (04320366) includes the western edge of the{Borough of {Chesterfield}and the outlying villages of{Old Brampton}and{Holymoorside.}The major land-use is farming; arable and grazing being the main types.
{Holymoorside}is a large village in the SW. of the area. The village is situated in the narrow Hipper valley. To the west the area rises to Holy Moor (250m). The area is just outside the eastern edge of the{Peak District {National Park.}The A619 runs through the middle of the area. It is a busy through route across the Peak District.
The western edge of Chesterfield consists mainly of housing estates. These include{Loundsley Green, Walton, {Somersall and Brookside.
